title: 想问个MOD
author: caijue
txt_content: 就是有个工业MOD加上了采石场，矿井等，那是啥MOD？求地址

replies.author: exzhawk
replies.txt_content:
BuildCraft
官方网站: http://www.mod-buildcraft.com/
wiki: http://minecraftbuildcraft.wikia ... aft_Buildcraft_Wiki
某百科: http://tab.mcmod.cn/class.php?c=4
某搬运: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-65925-1-1.html

replies.author: loveqiutian9413
replies.txt_content:
BC MOD  全名Buildcraft。也就是建筑MOD！
